dc:description.dcterms:abstract: The present study pursues the recommendation in the action plan to enhance the coordination of the Chilean Agricultural Innovation System (AIS) by the Chilean Ministry of Agriculture (MINAGRI) with the creation of a Directorate for Agricultural Innovation. In response to this recommendation, MINAGRI established an informal coordination unit within the Subsecretaryâ€™s office, which started to follow up on the recommendations of the three reports. At the request of the Subsecretary and the informal coordination unit, in the current paper the World Bank elaborates a proposal for how such a Directorate for Agricultural Innovation could be established and how it could function
